CBS News reports that Dodge-Chrysler is seriously rethinking minivans as an automotive form factor, and that the company plans to completely redesign the iconic American family hauler. We need to seriously rethink the minivan, said Sergio Marchionne , CEO of Chrysler, in a recent ABC interview. ''We need to retain all its functionality but make it much more versatile. Strong words from the company the popularized the minivan concept

She also wished her ex and his fiancee, Kayte Walsh , love and happiness in their new marriage. Kelsey Grammer , 55, told David Letterman on his show last month that he plans to marry Kayte Walsh sometime in February. The veteran actor starred in the comedy series ''Cheers'' and ''Frasier.

Addressing charges that he failed to provide enough troops for the Iraq War, the former defence chief wrote: In retrospect, there may have been times when more troops could have helped. But Donald Rumsfeld insists that if senior military officers had reservations about the size of the invading force, they never informed him, the Post said.
